ValidationRule.description: Asset with Container, Material, Project Code, Schedule Type, or Company Category fields cannot be combined together.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK( AssetId__c )), OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Container__c, "")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Material__c, "")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Schedule_Type__c , "")), NOT(ISBLANK(Project_Code__c)), NOT(ISBLANK( Company_Category__c )) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Asset with Container, Material, Project Code, Schedule Type, or Company Category fields cannot be combined together.
